description: This file defines a React functional component named ComponentCard, which renders a preview card for UI components along with actions such as copying code snippets and navigation links. It uses external modules for routing and utility functions and contains internal logic for copying code and rendering different component previews based on item IDs.

methods.name: ComponentCard({ item })
methods.description: React functional component that displays a component preview card with actions like copy and view. It takes an 'item' object as prop, renders previews based on item.id, and handles user interactions such as copying code snippets.
